titleStmt.title: Ekdikēsis or A discourse of vengeance Delivered in a sermon preached at Dorchester, at the assizes holden there for the county of Dorset, March. 4. 1663. By Henry Glover rector of Shroton.
titleStmt.author: Glover, Henry, b. 1624 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome. And are to be sold by William Churchill. Book-seller in Dorchester,

notesStmt.note: The first word of title is in Greek characters.
Running title reads: A discourse of vengeance.
Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
